about_the_game:
Air VR is a new virtual reality game with an emphasis on hyper mobile combat mechanics. Choose from 4 unique classes and climb up a procedurally generated 1-4 player co-op PvE experience or enter the arena for 2-8 player PvP and see who comes out on top!

UNIQUE WEAPON CLASSES

Choose from four available classes, each with a unique movement mechanic. Jump, fly, sling, and teleport using your class weapon to climb to the top.

CO-OP PVE

Navigate procedurally generated levels that take you up into the sky. Defeat monsters and huge bosses as you travel up through the caves and onto the surface solo or with a friend up to four players!

DEATHMATCH PVP

Enter the arena with 2-8 players and fight to see who will come out on top.

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED MAPS

Explore the vertical procedurally generated levels and fight waves of monsters to climb up and onto the surface and into the sky! Every playthrough is generated differently for a unique experience each time.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER

Customize your appearance quickly and easily. Collect skins to create your perfect avatar.

name: Air VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980

short_description: Air VR is a virtual reality shooter where you fly, jump, and fight monsters and other players. Choose a weapon class and climb up procedurally generated levels in 1-4 player co-op PVE or enter the arena for 2-8 player deathmatch PVP.
